item.title: Main Cargo Deck Crew Alerting System – Access to Compartment Prohibited in Flight

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided access to main cargo compartment is prohibited in flight.

numlitem.para: Access to main cargo compartment is prohibited in flight.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "MAIN DECK ACCESS PROHIBITED IN FLT" AND "MAIN DECK CREW ALERTING SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
